Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: ((Pre-requisites must be met by the first day of class or students will be withdrawn). Third-year standing; and 3 credits of 100- and/or 200-level English or one of (a) WRDS 150 or 350; (b) ASTU 100 or 101; (c) ARTS 001. Recommended: 6 credits of 100- and/or 200-level English and/or writing courses.)
